PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryTypeTensioningEquipment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of tensioning equipment used in railway. The property set can be used by the predefined type TENSIONINGEQUIPMENT of IfcDiscreteAccessory.

PropertyDef.Name: AssemblyInstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Instructions to describe how the system / equipment / facility is assembled.

PropertyDef.Name: HasBreakLineLock
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the equipment has the function of brake line lock or not.

PropertyDef.Name: TensileStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the ability to withstand breakage apart under applied force.

PropertyDef.Name: RatioOfWireTension
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of wire tension to tensioner weight.

PropertyDef.Name: TransmissionEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Transmission efficiency of the tensioning equipment.
